name: Delta Meadowvale Hotel and Conference Centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked my June 16th wedding with the Delta Meadowvale, and while my wedding day was most-definitely a dream come true, I did have a couple of issues with the hotel itself.
reviews.title: Booked my wedding here

likes.disliked: — The fact that the hotel lost my cake topper

reviews.text: * My husband had our complimentary honeymoon suite for the night before the wedding, so that him and his parents and groomsmen could use the full suite to get ready in the morning. The wedding party spent some time in the suite before the rehearsal and it was spectacular! You needed a map to get through this! One bedroom (big beautiful king-sized bed), with a living room/dining room attached, a fireplace, and two bathrooms. Absolutely no complaints about the room. I actually feel sorry for the housekeepers for having to clean up after my husband and his groomsmen partied in it the night before the wedding! I only wish I could've spent more time in this exquisite suite, but since we had to leave at 4am the morning after the wedding, that wasn't necessarily the case for me!
reviews.title: Ok, but nothing special

likes.disliked: — Could hear shower/toilet very loudly from nearby rooms

reviews.title: Clean, Good Service, Great Food
reviews.text: * My husband and my in-laws enjoyed a nice, relaxing time spent at the pool the day before the wedding (while I was running around figuring out last-minute details! But I digress). As nervous as he was about getting married, he found the atmosphere around the pool to be very relaxing, and said that the bartender at the Splashes patio bar very friendly.

* We booked the florist and decorator that the hotel recommended, and I was very surprised and thrilled with everything. The decor was exactly like I wanted and I literally gasped when I saw the room. It was wonderful!
reviews.title: Not the Greatest...

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for a basketball tournament overall I would list this hotel as very good. It was kept very clean the location for us was not very close to some of our venues. Plus there was not a lot of selection for restaurants or fast foods. The rooms were clean and was nicely equipped. There was a nice pool and slide available which we did not have the time to enjoy. I think the value for this hotel was appropriate. The two negative comments I would make of the hotel.
reviews.title: Restaurant Waitress brings down Overall Rating of a Very Good Hotel

reviews.text: 1 The only parking was at the front of the hotel so you had to carry everything thru the hotel to the back tower. When you are going in an out a lot it would easier to have another entrance.
reviews.title: Pricey,good location,worn out rooms.

reviews.text: 2 When we travel with our team the waitress either suggests a bill solution or asks us how we want to do it. What happen is after a game we all arrived at different times over a 1/2 hour time period. Food was ordered and when the bill arrived it was one large bill. When it was brought to her attention the problem she wanted as to divide the bill for our group of 22 people. In the end each family wrote down what they had and she then prepared separate bills. The manager said there was nothing else that could be done. Then after all that they added the the gratitude to the bill. The food was good but not enough to support this confusion.
reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it would be.

likes.liked: — Excellent staff and very nice lobby.
likes.disliked: — Rooms are quite tired in looks.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good location but not cheap.Staff ok but rooms a real disapointment,worn out big time.
reviews.title: Dirty room

reviews.text: I went to the hotel for a conference. I have always wondered what the hotel rooms looked liked.
reviews.title: out dated
Bedbugs
reviews.text: We stayed at the Delta for one night and were horrified when we pulled down the covers to go to bed and found bedbugs in the bed!!! We were able to change rooms but did not have a very good sleep. The next morning, we tried to complain at the front desk when we were checking out, but the woman behind the counter ignored our complaint completely and was actually quite rude to us.

reviews.title: Great for Meetings
reviews.text: To be fair, we have stayed at this hotel a number of times before without any problems, but this was a situation where our stay was quite affected by a very disturbing problem and we did not feel that our complaints were taken seriously by the person we dealt with at the front desk.

Attended a conference in January at the DMRCC. Everything was great. Staff were superb and the food was excellent. After reading some other comments on the site about meeting rooms, I had my concerns, but everything went off without a hitch.
reviews.title: We enjoyed our stay
Nice Hotel But Not That Near Airport....
reviews.text: Thanks to the great team at that hotel for making everything a success. (insider note, Sales Team was amazing. Frank (Director of Sales) and his team are great!

reviews.title: Our wedding at the Delta
reviews.text: My Boyfriend and I spent Labour Day Weekend at the DMRCC. The property itself is quite nice, due to to the time of year the flowers were still in bloom and the grounds looked quite lush.

reviews.title: A good place for business or pleasure
reviews.text: We spent 4 nights here while house hunting and enjoyed many aspects of this fairly typical hotel. The lobby was lovely - a great way to accommodate the many conventioneers in the building. The pool and fitness club were above average, the breakfast a somewhat average buffet but certainly adequate. The rooms were confortable and quiet (we had 2 rooms) and attendance by the maintenance staff to minor problems (flickering light and slow draining tub) was quick and unobtrusive. They also responded quickly when the pop machine took my money without returning a can. The dining room, almost vacant on a Saturday night, was a most pleasant surprise - lovely cuisine with some regional flair. Better than we had expected. Good location for many purposes - we'd stay there again!

reviews.title: What to expect?
reviews.text: I stayed at the Delta Hotel. It's enterance sets it apart from the other surronding hotels.
